clinical_study.brief_title: Development of a Questionnaire to Assess Patient Knowledge About Non-vitamin K Anticoagulants (NOAC)
clinical_study.official_title: Development and Validation of a Novel Educational Program for Patients Prescribed Non-vitamin K Anticoagulants (NOAC)

brief_summary.textblock: Pharmacists are in the best position to counsel and educate patients on anticoagulant agents such as NOACs. This should enable patients to play a more active role in their treatment and ultimately enhance adherence behaviour. However, educational elements should be targeted to knowledge. Thus, the investigators will develop and validate a questionnaire that can assess knowledge about NOACs

primary_outcome.measure: Validation of the new questionnaire assessed by questionnaire
primary_outcome.description: Patients will rate on a 4-point likert scale feasibility, acceptability and comprehension of the new questionnaire immediately after the questionnaire had been filled in the first time.

primary_outcome.time_frame: 7 days after visit 1, before and after the educational program
primary_outcome.description: Number of correct/incorrect answers measured at visit 2 before and after the educational program has been dispensed (7 days after visit 1)

primary_outcome.measure: Test retest validity of the new questionnaire
primary_outcome.description: Number of correct/incorrect answers measured at visit 1 and 2 (0 respectively 7 days after visit 1)

secondary_outcome.description: change in adherence between visits 1 (baseline) and visit 3
change in satisfaction between visits 1 (baseline) and visit 3

secondary_outcome.measure: Patient's health literacy assessed by questionnaire

other_outcome.measure: Number of patients having an anticoagulation identification card

intervention.description: Patients will receive several questionnaires to fill in. Knowledge about NOACs will be assessed with a newly developped questionnaire and an educational program will be dispensed while analysing the answers (reactive educational program).

study_pop.textblock: Patients having a prescription for NOACs
